sentences.english: Team needs to get it together soon!

sentences.english: We must hang together, or we'll be hanged seperately.

sentences.english: Team's struggling right now and so guys need to get on the same page.
sentences.chinese: 球队正在禁受磨练，各人必需拧成一股绳。
